Articles.Content: The challenge is to build a spaceplane that resembles the Imperial Acclamator-Class frigate from Star Wars.
Because he didn't give you a picture of one, here's

I haven't made one of those, but I did make this not too long ago:

Here is the link: https://www.dropbox.com/s/h57rwcvxzhw6pum/Corvette.craft

Edited October 1, 2012 by Kosmo-not
this is a challenge i am never trying
Thanks for posting a picture, and WOW, that is an accurate Corvette design!

Corellian Corvette

NICE.
Nice. I've been trying to build an X-Wing in 0.13, but I can't get a cockpit to set far enough back on a fuselage.

It's no Acclamator, but it IS an X-Wing. Sort of...

<a href="/image_zoom.php?id=/user_images/9763/1349013957m"><img src="http://images.mocpages.com/user_images/9763/1349013957m_SPLASH.jpg" border="0" width="500" height="281" alt=""></a>

It uses the smaller SRB's to get off the runway and has extra winglets and flaps/ailerons to help with lift, but it is an X-Wing.

<a href="/image_zoom.php?id=/user_images/9763/1349013966m"><img src="http://images.mocpages.com/user_images/9763/1349013966m_SPLASH.jpg" border="0" width="500" height="281" alt=""></a>

Atmospheric flight only. I don't think I could get this into orbit really, and I seem to recall it breaking up a bit on landing.

<a href="/image_zoom.php?id=/user_images/9763/1349013970m"><img src="http://images.mocpages.com/user_images/9763/1349013970m_SPLASH.jpg" border="0" width="500" height="281" alt=""></a>

Hmm, ladders as laser cannons. Seems perfectly reasonable to me.

I don't think any Star Destroyers will be legitimately possible until orbital construction is implemented, but for anybody who is going to try, good luck!
.craft for the corvette please. tried to make my own but couldnt get the engines to be positioned right

.craft for the corvette please. tried to make my own but couldnt get the engines to be positioned right

I posted a link to the .craft file. Remember to turn on unlimited fuel.
Now that's a nice piece of work! Reminds me a bit of the HTV2!

Hey saw your thread.. and I though I might share this ship i made a few days ago... I know its not really anything like the Frigate but I could make it more triangular and clean it up a bit, but that'll have to wait untill I can be bothered ...... also flies like a brick.

Its also missing a few panels that I didnt put on the back cos I was fiddling with the guts.

I realize this thread is old, but hey, I made an Acclamator :3

And the Bottom.

Working on a Venator class now.

::TOP SECRET::

I may have used the SpaceDock mod to get it into orbit as it is not atmosphere worthy.

I'm working on a TIE fighter SSTO just now. Or at least Darth Vaders' variant of the design. (Not the one with straight wings)

It's coming along nicely so far. Early tests show much promise.

Some of these ships look nice too. the corvette is fricken sweet.
Hey Tie fighter.no no don't angry i am just kidding.One of space ship is going to Earth looks like so real.If i fail i will play it more and more.
